product_name: Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 Waterproof Binoculars
long_description: The high-performance Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 waterproof binoculars incorporate high-quality optics to offer bright and clear viewing in almost any light and weather conditions.
